amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1502 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 32. Record Vote Number: 225.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1502 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 28. Record Vote Number: 224.
